title: Standing female figure
description: Standing Female Figure wearing a triple necklace with dangles across front, flat earplugs, elaborate headdress. Fish style feet, diamond eyes. Tip of right arm missing. Beige clay with traces of red pigments on headdress and necklace traces of white around eyes and headdress, Mexican (Michoacan), 200-600AD
creditline: Gift of Lucille and Arthur Weiss
